topic.shortdesc: This solution contains the core components of a typical Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack Platform solution:

ul.li: Block Storage (Cinder with LVM, Ceph, EqualLogic)

Networking (Nova networking default; Neutron networking available)Neutron networking and Swift are available via custom Services engagements, for customer evaluation only. Dell currently recommends using Nova networking for production deployments of this solution.
Object Store (Swift, available but not part of the solution)1
